strapiPost.title: Shaun White Visits Rogers For Fiesta Twists 360ยบ Event
strapiPost.content:
Ever imagine you'd see legendary snowboarder Shaun White throw a Double McTwist 1260... in front of a Walmart...in Arkansas? We didn't either, but there's a chance you might this Sunday, Jan 8, at the Pleasant Crossing Walmart in Rogers.

  • Stunts and snacks: Each time slot includes a showing of snowboarders performing epic stunts, athletes doing extreme trampoline flips, and a chance to sample Old El Paso's new Fiesta Twists.
  • Full 360ยบ: Walmart+ Members can bring up to three guests, and the first 200 Walmart+ members have a chance to sign up for a meet and greet with Shaun White.

Learn more about the event and reserve a spot HERE.
